Sinesis/Dracona:

"i believe you have it backwards, my friend.....i have death sentences all
over the globe...i've caught over thousands of bountys in my time....you
don't want to screw with me......and if you pushed me off you know i would
come back.....Megatron is the reason i am here and there is nothing you can
do about my presence.....one piece of advice for you......don't try to fight
with me.........you may end up in stasis lock..or worse...." he lays back
and starts to spin his axe with his eyes closed.....relaxing until they made
it wherever they were going.......

Dracona decided to take him up on his offer and explored the base. "i have a
hidden laboratory i think you need to know about......but earlier, a damn
Hell Beast lowlife named Gangon fell in by accident the idiot...i changed
it's position.....it's not hard, because it's on wheels." she smiles
again.....
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Shredder/Zardus::
>
> Shredder laughs at Sinesis' last comments, ignoring Quickstrike.
>
> "We don't need arrogant weaklings," He says insultingly as he puts away
his
> gun.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zardus stops near a door. "This will serve as your quarters. You may take
a
> tour of the ship if you want."
>
> He walks off.
